summary: A collection of lightweight utilities that aid Open Library catalog processing, offering text normalization, accent handling, string cleaning, author/date parsing, ISBN tidying, as well as helper routines for editing records, performing HTTP requests with retry logic, and retrieving related resources such as Amazon data, Internet Archive items, and MARC source information.
business_intent: Enable reliable ingestion, cleanup, and enrichment of Open Library catalog records by standardizing textual data, correcting key fields, and fetching supplemental metadata from external services.
